package.name: choreo_descartes_planner
package.description: This package extends descartes planning package's ability to search joint path on a much larger ladder graph, by using sparse representation sparse ladder graph and run RRT* on this sparse graph. Then the sparse graph is extended back to ladder graph and run shortest path on it. This package is a part of the choreo assembly planning framework and contains several assembly application-dependent helper functions.
